__e: And this time, I won't be there to save him, and he won't be here to save you.
Yes, and you'd do anything to save him, and he'd do anything to save you, and that is the problem.

Ouch. I tried saving him from himself, but I was unsuccessful.
All because you were trying to save him from himself.
